extendedInfo.description: The Yacht Week has been a yearly event since 2006. We offer an outstanding holiday for you and your friends. What makes us unique? Our ability to combine a low price with fun people and unforgettable events. Every day is exceptional. Every night is something magical.  We want to make yachting accessible for everyone! It is all about sailing and fun. We aim to provide the best week for every guest! So gather your friends and join this truly international phenomenon in the Caribbean and the Mediterranean.  Believe us... it's nothing like the real world!
